data.message:
I wish english slang was my  mother tongue!  ... I just love listening to you and I DO get the point of your songs ... but when i read the lyrics and the rap genius ... there is so much unknown words and I check some in dictionary ... (google translate is not good for my language) ... 
Hey, Eminem, you are the best! 
Even if I don't understand it all ... Even if I get only a half of it ... You are the best, cuz this half is bigger and better then other's people whole! Love you :)

replies.message: No one manipulates the English language as well as this man🙏🏻
Dont u really get what hes saying read this post and what is circled can u c Open both eyes then tell me

I can read the Em's post above. I understand it too, but I have had to translate some words before. And even the dictionary doesn't tell me, what does it mean, "to summon someone". ? 
And it is similar with every song and every line. I don't get it perfectly all  ... I wish i would ... but I still love the way he raps. :)

(Verse 1: Justin Queen) 

Fully conversed me using this verse literally' / Fully awaken my knees are shacking for I know it's you my brother that has forsaken me'/ fuck it I forgive you why do you think you can't get to me
'/ shine 🌞 so bright I draw a crowed physically and emotionally' / Come at me bro and I'll destroy your ass dimensionally bitch sit back I crave it internally ! 👁🌊
too late to hop the bandwag grandma
ME to I don't understand it all but I always figure out the songs whats all about

Hello, I'd like to introduce you to Mr. Vladimir Smailović, who helped me in raising money for college.
This way I want to thank him and recommend it to all of you who have problems with the money. For more details i will give you his FB profile which is:
Vladimir Smailovic
Yeah 'cause even if sometimes it's difficult 2 understand his lyrics at all, there's somethin kinda magic in his words, that motivates n affect everyone
